metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9959 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The JPXStream::init function in Poppler 0.78.0 and earlier doesn't check for negative values of stream length, leading to an Integer Overflow, thereby making it possible to allocate a large memory chunk on the heap, with a size controlled by an attacker, as demonstrated by pdftocairo.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Marking emscripten ignored as poppler code is only for test/example.

criterions.comment: emscripten: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
texlive-bin package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
